ValidationRule.description: The mandatory fields can't be empty.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( ISBLANK(cgcloud__Asset_Type__c), ISBLANK(AccountId), ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Sales_Org__c,""), ISBLANK(cgcloud__Description_Language_1__c), ISBLANK(cgcloud__Valid_From__c), ISBLANK(cgcloud__Valid_Thru__c), ISBLANK(Name) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The mandatory fields can't be empty.
